Package Boundary

Class AdminUI

java.lang.Object
Boundary.UserUI
Boundary.AdminUI
public class AdminUI extends UserUI
This Class represents the UI interface for Admins. It extends the abstract UserUI class and provides the implementation for the showSelections and showUI methods. This Class contains 2 key methods: showSelections and showUI to display the list of actions available for Admins and to handle inputs. The other methods below are helper functions that call the static methods of Controllers.

  • Method Details

    • showSelections

      public void showSelections()
      Implementation of abstract method in UserUI. Displays the list of possible actions to the current authenticated Admin. This method should be called repeatedly in the main While loop with each iteration.
      Specified by:
      showSelections in class UserUI

    • showUI

      public void showUI(Scanner sc)
      Implementation of abstract method in UserUI. This method operates in sync with the showSelections method above to accept input from the current authenticated Admin.
      Specified by:
      showUI in class UserUI
      Parameters:
      sc - Scanner object to allow Admins to make their selections.
